The box, which actually released as a physical box rather than just a digital purchase (rare on PC these days) came out on October 10th, 2007 on PC and Xbox 360, with a PS3 version releasing later that same year. The Orange Box was met with universal critical acclaim, Team Fortress 2 remains one of the most popular games on Steam.
